successes.title: ATLAS: Performance Professional Comes to Socks
successes.description: Walk the Globe in ATLAS: Bodymapped socks with Coffee-infused that keep your feet fresh - like a Brita filter in your shoe.

Pledges.description: TEAM ATLAS: Access to backers-only updates and exclusives.
2-PACK: Own the Atlas. Well, two pairs of them at least. Mix & Match encouraged. Add $20 to your pledge for international shipping.
2-PACK PLUS ATMOS: Rock Atlas and Atmos with 2 pairs of Atlas socks and a perfect Atmos Tee. Mix & Match encouraged. Add $30 to your pledge for international shipping.
5-PACK WEEKEND TO WEEKEND: 5 pairs of Atlas socks for the Mon-Fri grind. Mix & Match encouraged. Add $30 to your pledge for international shipping.
5-PACK WEEKEND TO WEEKEND PLUS 2 ATMOS: 5 pairs ATLAS socks plus 2 ATMOS tees equals a perfect week. Mix & Match encouraged. Add $30 to your pledge for international shipping.

10-PACK ATLAS ALL THE TIME: 10 pairs ATLAS socks. Maybe you love socks. Maybe you hate laundry. Either way, weâ€™ve got you covered. Mix & Match encouraged. Add $30 to your pledge for international shipping.
10-PACK ATMOS ALL THE TIME: 10 pairs Atmos base layers. Mix & Match encouraged. Add $40 to your pledge for international shipping.
10 PLUS 10: 10 pairs Atlas socks and 10 Atmos base layers.  Mix & Match encouraged.  Add $40 to your pledge for international shipping.
